'''Survival Grilled Fish''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Grilled Tiger Fish]] with [[Keqing]]. The [[recipe]] for Grilled Tiger Fish is obtainable from [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 1,250 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 15.

Survival Grilled Fish restores '''16'''% of Max HP and an additional '''1,350''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List}}
* The skewer used for the grilled fish resembles the hairpin Keqing wears, referencing her [[Keqing/Lore#Survival Hairpin|character stories]].
* To celebrate Keqing's birthday, the official Chinese site for ''Genshin Impact'' published a blog post purportedly by Long Erjun, columnist for [[The Steambird]], with a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/11751 real-life recipe] for Survival Grilled Fish. Also included in this edition was a recipe for Grilled Tiger Fish.
